2024980.name: Rollers of the Realm: Reunion Demo
2024980.description:
In this sequel to Rollers of the Realm, oin the Rogue, Knight, Mage and Healer on an epic campaign to travel between worlds and reunite lost civilizations to battle an unearthed ancient menace.

Battle enemies above, below, and beyond. Make friends and allies. Platform and parkour through medieval cities and underground labyrinths. Solve puzzles and navigate mazes.

Compete on global and friend leaderboards in Ranked Mode.

Rollers of the Realm: Reunion offers an award-winning gameplay mashup for players of all skill levels.


  • Pinball + RPG perfected! An all new game building on the best of the original award winning mashup
  • Flip into enemies to fight, roll, dash and bounce to navigate mazes and maps
  • Campaign with lovable characters and dozens of pinball playfields with high replay value
  • Ranked Playfields to compete for high scores on friends and global leaderboards
  • Split-Flipper: 2-player couch co-op with split controls.
  • Manage a party of 5 pinball heroes with unique stats, mighty abilities and upgrades
  • Build your strategy and skill and hot swap hero roster during play for tactical advantage
2024980.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
